document.full_text: commodities prices rose on monday, pushing the reuters-jefferies crb index to a fresh two-and-a-half year high on a weaker dollar and strong trade data from china.
document.title: commodities ride high; euro zone debt hit
lines_and_colors: commodities prices rose on monday, pushing the reuters-jefferies crb index to a fresh two-and-a-half year high on a weaker dollar and strong trade data from china.
